Articles.Content:
Surface of the Moon, Sea of Tranquility, 1969:

"Jeb be careful.", said Bob.

"I will relax.", Jeb said back.

*Neil and Buzz*

"They're walking towards us.", Neil said to the medical officer.

"What do they look like?", The medical officer asked.

"Like little green men from sci-fi movies.", Buzz said over the radio.

*Jeb arriving at the LEM*

"Hello strange creature", Jeb said happily

"What?", Neil said not knowing the strange language.

"Is that backwards Spanish?", Buzz asked still shocked at the sight of an alien.

*Jeb hands Neil a bag of snacks*

"Thanks?", Neil says confused.

*Jeb places a flag then heads back to the lander with Bill and they leave the surface*

"What was that?", Neil asked still confused.

"I don't know Neil, I just don't know" Buzz said back

*no people on Earth would see this exchange because the Apollo 11 camera shut off during the exchange*
